title: Research and Markets: India Smartwatch Market, CY H1 2015 - India Smartwatch Market Shipments Value Reached Around $2.37 Million
text:
Research and Markets: India Smartwatch Market, CY H1 2015 - India Smartwatch Market Shipments Value Reached Around $2.37 Million September 24, 2015 01:22 PM Eastern Daylight Time 
DUBLIN--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/lbs52s/india_smartwatch ) has announced the addition of the "India Smartwatch Market, CY H1 2015" report to their offering. 
Increasing Smartphone penetration, growing consumer demand and technological advancements in the wearable segment are expected to increase the growth of India's Smartwatch Market. Additionally, recent entry of international players will further assist the growth of the Smartwatch Market in the country. 
Key features of the report: 
- Total Smartwatch shipment in India 
- Market share by various players in various segments and specifications 
- Shipments by market players 
- Model wise shipments by each company 
- Price of each model
